Title: Relates to the assessment of extraordinary needs count for purposes of the apportionment of public moneys to school districts employing eight or more teachers
Summary: Relates to the assessment of extraordinary needs count for purposes of the apportionment of public moneys to school districts employing eight or more teachers; defines count of homeless children and children or youth in foster care.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the extraordinary needs count for purposes of the apportionment of public moneys to school districts employing eight or more teachers
